TEXT.TITLE: CALNY <CLNY.O> NAMES NEW PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: Calny Inc said M. Hal Taylor has been named poresident and chief operating officer, succeeding Marvin Hart, who had been serving as president on an interim basis and remains chairman and chief executive. The company said Taylor, who joined the company in January, has also been named to the board. Reuter
